short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quality of life tweaks for membean.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:
• Fixes document title while training
• Always show time*
• Warn before dubious minutes
• Automatically click letter hint button*

*Can be disabled in settings, accessed by clicking the add-on's icon
